com.adaptinet.messaging
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.adaptinet.messaging.Message
public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object

The Message class describes the actual message data transferred between plugins.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs an empty Message object

          Constructs a Message object with the specified destination address

Message(java.lang.String toUri, ITransceiver replyTransceiver)
          Constructs a Message object that will respond to the specified transceiver and use the given URI as the destination address.

Parameters:
trasceiver - destination transceiver
bSecure - true if a secure protocol will be used (https), false if a non-secure protocol will be used (http)
